Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back 2026 SCHOOL HOLIDAYS KIDS STAY, PLAY & EAT FREE* View gallery / Back Naviti Resort Aerial Naviti Pool Naviti Kids Club Naviti Kayaking Naviti sunrise Fiji The Naviti Resort - 2026 School Holidays &vert; Return flights • 4 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Just an hour and a half drive from Nadi Airport and you will arrive at The Naviti Resort. Kick up your feet, relax and slip into Fiji time. Enjoy the many facilities on offer; venture to the swim-up pool bar where mouth-watering cocktails satisfy tropical thirsts, dine in delight at the three restaurants on-site or indulge the senses with a blissful treatment at the spa. Suited for those wanting a variety of activities, this beachfront resort offers everything from snorkelling and kayaking to a 9-hole golf course, archery, water polo and gym. There’s plenty for the kids to do too and a great Kids Club! This resort is also the perfect location for exploring nearby Sigatoka and surrounds. Try game fishing, diving, caving or river jet boating, you won’t find a shortage of things to do while on holiday here. For those looking for good value for money, the Naviti would be one of our top picks. View more View less 4 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 2439 per person share twin Flying with Fiji Airways 2026 SCHOOL HOLIDAYS KIDS STAY, PLAY & EAT FREE* Enquire now Sale Period : until 10 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Value class airfares flying Fiji Airways from Auckland, Wellington & Christchurch to Nadi 4 nights accommodation Return Nadi airport transfers Buffet Breakfast daily *KIDS Stay and Eat FREE (max 2 kids, 2-11 yrs) *KIDS Play FREE (max 2 kids, 5-11 yrs) FREE use of all non-motorised water activities FREE use of gym, tennis courts and kids club Bonus: Add on 3 extra nights for the price of 1! Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Garden View Room Infused with genuine Fijian tradition and culture, these inviting rooms boast stunning views of the mountains and gardens. Thoughtfully designed with local craftsmanship, they are furnished with elegant dark wood and rattan pieces, complemented by tiled floors. Each room features a private balcony or patio, offering a tranquil space to enjoy the meticulously landscaped tropical gardens. Auckland 4 night package from $2439 per person share twin Additional nights from $279 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 01 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Wellington 4 night package from $2439 per person share twin Additional nights from $279 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 18 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 18 Jul 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $2439 per person share twin Additional nights from $279 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Ocean View Room These charming rooms offer the perfect family accommodation, with ample space for two adults and two children (12 and under). The welcoming décor showcases a fresh white color scheme complemented by vibrant greens, stylish tiled floors, and a blend of designer Pacific and Balinese furniture. Each room also includes a fully furnished balcony or patio, providing a stunning view of the captivating Pacific Ocean. Auckland 4 night package from $2549 per person share twin Additional nights from $305 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 01 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 01 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Wellington 4 night package from $2549 per person share twin Additional nights from $305 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 18 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 18 Jul 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $2549 per person share twin Additional nights from $305 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 2), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Superior Garden View Room This room is made for families of 2 adults & 3 children offering lovely garden views with a queen bed and separate bunk bed. Auckland 4 night package from $2849 per person share twin Additional nights from $385 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 3), extra night FREE Travel 01 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 01 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Wellington 4 night package from $2849 per person share twin Additional nights from $385 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 3), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 18 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 18 Jul 26 Christchurch 4 night package from $2849 per person share twin Additional nights from $385 per person share twin Kids Fly from $769 per child (2-11yrs, Max 3), extra night FREE Travel 02 Apr - 19 Apr 26, 02 Jul - 19 Jul 26 Families come in all shapes and sizes. If the advertised room type doesn't suit your family, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Sale ends 10 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 13 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Value class flying Fiji Airways to Nadi from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Flight departures from New Zealand are based on: from Auckland daily, from Wellington on a Monday, Thursday and Saturday and from Christchurch on a Monday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday • Travel dates specified are subject to departure days from NZ and are subject to change based on availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a Meal /Beverage package it must be purchased for all adults for the full duration of your accommodation • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding • Where Kids eat free, this is from selected restaurants, from selected menus at set times based on 1 child per 1 paying adult • Kids club age restrictions apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options.
